comment:
* Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when
     * an item in this view has been selected.

methods.name: void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id)
methods.comment:
*

Callback method to be invoked when an item in this view has been * selected. This callback is invoked only when the newly selected * position is different from the previously selected position or if * there was no selected item.

* * Implementers can call getItemAtPosition(position) if they need to access the * data associated with the selected item. * * @param parent The AdapterView where the selection happened * @param view The view within the AdapterView that was clicked * @param position The position of the view in the adapter * @param id The row id of the item that is selected

methods.name: void onNothingSelected(AdapterView<?> parent)
methods.comment:
* Callback method to be invoked when the selection disappears from this
         * view. The selection can disappear for instance when touch is activated
         * or when the adapter becomes empty.
         *
         * @param parent The AdapterView that now contains no selected item.

methodNames: void onItemSelected(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id)
